scripts.dev: npm run build -w @optiq/shared && concurrently "npm run dev -w @optiq/backend" "npm run dev -w @optiq/frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: npm run build -w @optiq/shared && npm run dev -w @optiq/backend
scripts.build: npm run build -w @optiq/shared && npm run prisma:generate -w @optiq/backend && npm run build -w @optiq/backend && npm run build -w @optiq/frontend
scripts.test: echo "No tests yet - add tests with: npm install --save-dev vitest @vitest/ui" && exit 0
